string.name: d1
string.value: Oh~ You're the one that met up with our Roly Poly's at the Eos Tower for me! How can I help you here? Huh? Haha, of course, I did not forget the lunch box my daughter made for me. I'm just waiting for lunch so I can eat them! I'll see you around!

string.name: n1
string.value: Did we ... miss our takeoff?

string.name: d0
string.value: I'm here taking care of a very important mission given to me by the Omega Sector. It is very dangerous around here, so I suggest you run right now.

string.name: d1
string.value: The Roswell Field is prone to aliens making apperances, so this place is under special constant watch. The attack is still on, so I suggest you and others not to get too comfortable in this place. I'll have to head back to the Sector for some more work, so I'll see you around!

string.name: name
string.value: Black Mesoranger

string.name: n0
string.value: Pink Mesoranger is ALWAYS late ... we can't be at our 100% strength unless all 5 of us are here.

string.name: n1

string.name: d0
string.value: Hello! I'm #b#p2040018##k, in charge of a mission to prevent the aliens from invading this place. It seems like they have been acting up more lately. It's very dangerous around here, so I suggest you run back to the Omega Sector for safety.

string.name: d1
string.value: You're the one that helped me get rid of #b#o4230116##k here at the Coolan Field. It feels good to find someone like you here at a place where dangerous aliens are a common sight. I'm still investigating on the mastermind behind these aliens. I'm going up against yet another alien, so it's not easy...

string.name: n0
string.value: Can I help you with anything? Enjoy your trip~

string.value: Anyone that wants to leave the ship and head back to the original spot, talk to me.

string.name: n2
string.value: Please be aware that if you go into the Cash Shop while on board, you'll be sent back to where you were before.

string.value: Weapon Seller

string.name: n0
string.value: There are places in Ludibrium where the monsters pop out of nowhere.

string.name: n1
string.value: We have a weapon JUST FOR YOU!

string.name: func
string.value: Armor Seller

string.name: n0
string.value: Welcome! Look around, see what you like.

string.name: n1
string.value: A tough armor is necessary, for the monsters may pop up anywhere inside the castle.

string.name: n0
string.value: Make sure you don't get lost inside the castle.

string.name: n1
string.value: Welcome to Ludibrium!

string.name: d0
string.value: Hello, there! I'm #b#p2041004##k, in charge of the security for Ludibrium. Lately there have been some filthy creatures dirtying up Eos Tower, and I don't like it one bit.

string.name: d1
string.value: Hey! You're the one that cleaned out the Eos Tower for me last time! How have you been? I'm so glad the number of monsters have generally decreased, and they aren't as wild as they were before. I really appreciate all your hard work. Oh well, hope you have a great day at Ludibrium!

string.name: n0
string.value: Hey, there!! How's it going??

string.name: n1
string.value: Isn't it beautiful today? I would like nothing more than just go somewhere...

string.name: d0
string.value: Oh, hi! I don't think I've met you before... have you been traveling around? I'm #b#p2041005##k, residing here in Ludibrium, and my father is the manager of the Toy Factory. If you have time, you should go see that place.

string.name: d1
string.value: Hello~! Thanks to you, my dad got his appetite back. He really enjoys it. How can I help you today? Oh no!!! You shouldn't enter this place with your shoes on! I cleaned up this place just now, you know!!! If you don't have much else to do, then please come back some other time!

string.name: n0
string.value: We sell stuff that you can't find anywhere else!

string.name: n1
string.value: Need potions or some food? You've come to the right place.

string.name: a0
string.value: You!! You aren't jacking anything from here, right?

string.name: a1
string.value: Touch anything here, and I'll be very very angry with you!

string.name: g0
string.value: It's tougher than you think, making new potions

string.name: g1
string.value: Hah! Just making new potions here ...

string.name: n0
string.value: Oh my, you still have that hairdo? That's sooo yesterday ...

string.name: n1
string.value: If you want to try a different hair style, then just talk to me!

string.name: func
string.value: Storage Keeper

string.name: n0
string.value: Looking for a place to store your mesos or items? Then look no further!

string.name: n1
string.value: Our storage is safe as a lock, so feel free to leave your stuff here!

string.name: n0
string.value: Welcome to our hair salon! I may be still in training, but how about letting me do your hair?

string.name: n1
string.value: It's a tough act being a hair stylist...

string.name: func
string.value: Plastic Surgeon

string.name: n0
string.value: Wanna change your face into something ... much more beautiful?

string.name: n1
string.value: You look fine now, but with a little touch here and there, you'll look FANTABULOUS

string.name: name
string.value: Yellow Mesoranger

string.name: n0
string.value: Worried about monsters? Let us handle them!

string.name: n1
string.value: It's our job to protect everyone here!

string.name: d0
string.value: Hi. I'm #b#p2041011##k, in charge of a special mission here. Have you seen an alien around here? Apparently they attract innocent strangers by sweet-talking to them, so please be aware of that.

string.name: d1
string.value: Hi. I'm #b#p2041011##k, in charge of a special mission here. Have you seen an alien around here? Apparently they attract innocent strangers by sweet-talking to them, so please be aware of that.

string.name: name
string.value: Pink Mesoranger

string.name: n0
string.value: It's so hard to wake up early each morning. I should stop being late ...

string.name: n1
string.value: I'm more than happy to protect you all, except for the fact that I sleep waaay too much...

string.name: d0
string.value: Hello, there. I'm #b#p2041012##k of Omega Sector, currently in a secret mission to prevent the alien invasion here. I've been really busy these days taking care of important missions. This place is very dangerous, so I suggest you get out of here and go to a safer place.

string.name: d1
string.value: You're back~ I've been getting up on time these days, and I'm never late on missions. I'm also glad the people upstairs are taking notice. It's all thanks to you. Now, I have something important to do, so please excuse me~

string.name: n0
string.value: You want to have a slim & sexy body like me? I will make your skin beautiful~

string.name: n1
string.value: Wow... you must be traveling all around... your skin got damaged a lot...

string.name: func
string.value: Pet Food Merchant

string.name: n0
string.value: Are you looking for the pet food?

string.name: n1
string.value: Aren't your pets hungry? I got some food for them~

string.name: f0
string.value: I feel like I've witnessed something incredible.

string.name: f1
string.value: ...I don't remember...the last few months...that I've been...missing...

string.name: f2
string.value: I've been trying to remember things, but it's hard.

string.name: f3
string.value: Did something terrible happen to me?

string.name: w0
string.value: Whenever I think about that day ... I get swept with fear, and tears would just come out.

string.name: w1
string.value: Please ... someone help me regain my lost memory.

string.name: d0
string.value: Hmmm...? I don't think we've ever met. What are you doing at my house? If you don't have anything to talk about, then please leave.

string.name: d1
string.value: You're the one that helped me find my lost memories. I can't thank you enough for your effort. I've been trying to live a normal life these days.

string.name: func
string.value: Scroll Seller

string.name: n0
string.value: I admit, I have failed in making scrolls every once in a while, but that's few and far between!

string.name: n1
string.value: I've made my share of mistakes making these scrolls, but don't worry, I'm good at this!

string.name: name
string.value: Ace of Hearts

string.name: n0
string.value: A sweet chocolate can go a long way towards helping you say I LOVE YOU!

string.name: n1
string.value: I, Mr. Ace of Hearts, will let you in on a secret recipe to a sweet chocolate of love ~

string.name: d0
string.value: I am here to bake lovely goods for everyone needing my service! Doesn't it smell good around here? Mmmm Hmmm!

string.name: d1
string.value: I can only make so much of it by myself. Please bear with me, for I can only make one per hour for you.

string.name: name
string.value: Hans the Assembler

string.name: n0
string.value: What should I make today?

string.name: f0
string.value: I am the best when it comes to assembling toys here at the Toy Factory.

string.name: f1
string.value: Gather up the materials I ask of you, and I'll make something nice for you in return~

string.name: d0
string.value: I just need few things to make a fun toy to play around with...but I don't know if I'm even allowed to make this.

string.name: d1
string.value: Hey, what's going on? Have you tried using the stuff I gave you the other day? That item had some experimental elements to it, and therefore a little dangerous, but it was fun making something I've always wanted to make. I have to get back to work now!

string.name: name
string.value: Rocky the Repairman

string.name: n0
string.value: Why does this keep breaking down?

string.name: d0
string.value: It's broken again...and I just fixed this not too long ago! Who did this?! If only I can get my hands on whoever that's responsible for this...ARRGH!!!

string.name: d1
string.value: Oh no, it must be the monsters again. As soon as I fix this, they come rushing back and break things again. Oh hey, how long have you been there? Thanks to the parts you got me, I've been fixing machines here and there, but they seem to break every other day, so I have no time to rest. I gotta go! Bye!

string.name: name
string.value: Mac the Mechanic

string.name: n0

string.name: name
string.value: Yang the Pilot

string.name: n0
string.value: Not everyone's blessed with a job like me - flying around the sky at will!

string.name: n1
string.value: It is quite scary looking down at the ground when you're waaaay up there.

string.name: n0
string.value: Come try it and you will be rewarded unexpectedly!

string.name: n1
string.value: Fishing is all about patience and effort... An ART...

string.name: n2
string.value: Feeling on your hand at the moment of catch... Unbelievable...!!!

string.name: func
string.value: Fishing Manager

string.name: n0
string.value: Best of Luck to all of you!

string.name: n1
string.value: Most important thing when fishing is choice of Bait.

string.name: n2
string.value: Be patience~ Maplers~!

string.name: n0
string.value: If you want to make the job adv. as the GM, come talk to me.
